data.text: Hiwa thengnga, Jisu'n Tiberias tuipui, Galilee tuidiil raaltiang rakaanna aleisi.
Halli mipui'n ama nukkha inheijui, ajarchu inmani ngai'n chuon inlak tholi akana ngai imindam kha inleimu.
Jisu'n chingbung aleikalla asiamruoi ngaile alei in-ong.
Khawa phakhan Jihudi ngai Rakaanna kahoi kha aleinaijei.
Jisu'n alei-enna mipui katamtak amadiang inheiwa kha aleimu, halli ma'n Philip diang aleiti, “Hiwa mipui bak kahunsik bakphur hi angtho tholi niracho sikme?”
Ma'n hiwa itihi Philip malung ensik tia iril eii; ama'n angme athosik inthiangnga aleijet.

Philip in amadiang aleimasang, “Dangka pum rajani innum inmani rakip in lekteii baksik-ah rachosik hunnuni.” 6:7. Dangka pum: Dangka pum khat in chounmi khat nisuokhat chountho man eii (enru Matt 20:2)
Asiamruoi inkhat Simon Peter naipa Andrew in amadiang aleiti,
“Pasal naipang inkhat satun waipool ra-nga li nga inni kachoi khat hin om, takkha hiwa mipui diangchu angsemma semminname?”
Jisu'n aleiti “Mi rakip kha min-ongru.” halli khawa munkhan chinthou katamtak aleimoong; halli mipui'n inlei in-ong; pasal miring lising ra-nga inlei eii.
Jisu'n waipool kha aleiya Pathian aleiminpaak, halli khawa khanna in-ong mi rakipdiang inleisem. Khawa angnga nga kha-um khan thoa inleisem, halli mi rakip in inbak maneii laiseng inleibak.
Mi rakip in inleihun phakhan, Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang aleiti, “Alek kaliam ngaikha khoomchunru; eini'n iteii minmangmui.”
Khawa jarra siamruoi ngai'n mipui bakbang satun waipool ra-nga makheiya kaliam rakip kha inkhoom chunna thumluk soomleini inleiminsip.
Mipui ngai'n Jisu itho inlak chuon kha inleimu phakhan, Inmani'n inleiti, “Inthiangnga hiwahi Pathian chongkachoi6:14. Pathian chongkachoi: Enru 1:21. manmasituolla kajuosik miring kha eii!”
Inmani'n heiwa inta azootmak pumma naruoi inta reng innaminchangsik ejei tikha Jisu'n ajet-ah; Jisu'n alooiya chingbungtiang atheinuoa aleisijei.
Kholei ahei ephakhan, Jisu siamruoi ngaikha tuidiil khan inleichum,
rakuong suungnga inleiluut, khat-um tuidiil rakaanli Capernaum tiang inleisi, zaan aheiluut katung Jisu'n inmani diang laheiwa titmak.
Thikaraang kangar aheiraangnga tuipui kha aleiminnik.
Asiamruoi ngai'n miles inthum emakli mili katung rakuong inleisep phakhan inmani'n tuichungnga Jisu'n rakuong kooltiang iheiwa kha inleimu, halli inmani ngai'n inleichi.
Takkha Jisu'n inmanidiang aleiti “Kei ka eii; chimaru.”
Halli inmani'n ama kha karok-ah rakuong suungnga inleikeiluut, halli khawapha takkhan rakuong kha intungnasik muongkhan aleituungjei.
Ziingkhuo warra tuidiil raalkhat tiangnga kaom mipui ngai'n rakuong inkhatbit omjei tikha inleijet, halli Jisu kha asiamruoi ngaikhale inrouimak takkha siamruoi ngaichu insisuojei tikha-um inleijet.
Pumi'n Pathian aminpaak suoli inmani'n waipool inleibakna mun tuikham koolkhan Tiberias makheiya rakuong lekkhat inheiwa.
Mipui ngai'n Jisu khat-um asiamruoi ngaikha khawakhan ommujei ti inleimu phakhan, inmani um rakuong ngaikhan inluut-ah Capernaumma Jisu ka-entok inleisi.
Mipui ngai'n ama kha tuidiil raalkhat tiang i-omkha inmu phakhan, inmani'n ama diang inleiti, “Karu, angtik pha-ah hiwahin niheiwame?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Kei'n inthiangnga nangnidiang kati: inlak chuon ningmu jarra kei ningna entok emak takkha waipool kakhop-ah ningbak jarra kei ningna entok eii.
Kamangthei bu sik-ah chuon thomaru; takkha Miring Sapa'n nangnidiang anapesik hektik kaboi ringna busik ah chuon thoru. Ajarchu Apa Pathian in izoot jetnabi kha ama chungnga adeengjei.”
Halli inmani'n amadiang inleiti, “Pathian chuon thonasik-ah, keini'n angme kinthosik?”
Jisu'n inmanidiang aleimasang, “Pathian chuonkha hiwahi eii, khachu Pathian in ijuotir amadiang ngamnaru.”
Inmani'n amadiang inleiti, “Halle angkachang inlak chuonme nang in nathosik halli keini'n kinmuli nang kinna-ngamnasik hi?
Nipi nipu ngai'n neelramma manna inleibak; hintia lei-injia ‘Ama'n marwaan makheiya inmanidiang baksik ah waipool aleipeii.’ ” Suok 16:4,15; Minpkla 78:24
Jisu'n inmanidiang aleiti, “Kei'n inthiangnga nangni diang kanati, marwaan makheiya waipool kanaleipeii kha Moses emak, takkha marwaan makheiya inthiang waipool kanape kha kei Kapa eii.
Pathian waipool khachu marwaan makheiya kajuo khat-um manmasituol diang ringna kapeii ama kha eii.”
Inmani'n amadiang inleiti “Pumi, hiwa waipoolhi keinidiang apha rakip ah napero.”
Jisu'n inmanidiang aleiti, “Kei ringna waipool kha ka eii, Kei kadiang kaheiwa miring kha wonkachaam ti omnuni; halli keidiang kangamna ama khan woikhat inlet-ah tuikaraal omnuni.
Takkha kei'n nangnidiang kanati khachu nangni'n kei ningnamujei innum keidiang nangamna makchu.
Kapa'n keidiang inapeii rakip ngaikha keidiang inheiwasik eii, halli Kei'n tuteii inkhat-um keidiang kaheiwa ngaikha angtikteii puutnuning.
Ajarchu kei'n marwaan makheiya kalungdou kathosik ah kijuo kha emak takkha kei kanajuotir ama racham kathosik ah kijuo kha eii.
Kei kanajuotir ama lungdou kha hiwahi eii, khachu keidiang inapejei ngaikha tuteii inkhat-um Kei'n minmang nuning, takkha ahekna nikhuoni inmani kha minringsik ti hi-eii.
Kapa imanuom khachu hiwahi eii, Asapa kamu khat-um ama diang ka-ngamna rakip in kumsoot ringna inmusik; Halli kei'n ama kha ahekna nikhuoni kaminringsik eii.”
“Kei marwaan makheiya kajuo waipool kha ka eii” atipi jarra Jihudi ngai'n ama chungnga leizootmu.
Inmani'n inleiti, “Hiwahi eini'n anuli apa nijet Joseph sapa Jisu, emak abe? Angtho tholi, halle, tuuntak ‘Kei marwaan makheiya kijuo eii itime?’ ”
Jisu'n inmanidiang aleimasang, “Nangni'n suungnga kei jarra num ningti kha daru.
Kei kanajuotir Kapa'n ama kha keidiang aheiruoimak inchu, tuteii innum keidiang heiwatheimu; halli kei'n ahekna nikhuoni khan ama kha kaminringsik eii.
Pathian chongkachoi ngai larik khan injiajei, ‘Inmani rakip ngaikha Pathian in aminchusik eii.’ Apa Pathian diangnga karangai khat-um ka-inchu rakip ngai'n keidiang inheiwa. Isa 54:13
Pathian makheiya kajuo ama'n elekleiya tuteii miring inkhat innum Apa Pathian lamumu; ama khabit eii Pa Pathian kamu.
Kei'n inthiangnga nangnidiang kanati, kangamna mi khan kumsoot ringna kha anei.
Kei ringna waipool kha ka eii.
Ningpi ningpu ngai'n neelramma manna inleibak halli inmani'n inleithijei.
Mi inkhat in abakli thimaknasik marwaan makheiya kajuo ringna waipool kha hi-eii.
Kei marwaan makheiya kajuo akaring waipool kha ka eii, hiwa waipool kabaktak miring kha, kumsoot aringsik eii; halli Kei'n manmasituol ringna sik-ah kapesik waipool khachu kei kataksa kha eii.”
Jihudi ngai'n inmani suungnga murruolsiak inleithoa inleiti “Angtho tholi hiwa miring pa'n ataksa eini baksik-ah anape matorsikme?”
Jisu'n inmanidiang aleiti, “Kei'n nangnidiang inthiangnga kanati, nangni'n Miring Sapa taksa kha ningbakmak khat-um ama thisen kha ning-inmak inchu, nangni ningpumma ringna ommak;
Kei kataksa kabak khat-um kei kathisen ka-in ngaikha kumsoot ringna kha innei, halli kei'n ahekna nikhuoni khan inmani kha kaminringsik eii.
Kei kataksa hi inthiang bu kha eii; halli kei kathisen hi inthiang insik kha eii.
Kei kataksa kabak khat-um kei kathisen ka-in ama khan keidiang inchat lekleiya aom, halli kei'n amadiang kaom.
Akaringchak Kapa'n kei anajuotir, khat-um kei'n kapa jarra kiring angnga, Kei kataksa kabak miring khan kei jarra aringsik eii.
Hiwahi eii, marwaan makheiya kajuo waipool kha; ningpi ningpu ngai'n inleibak suonuk inleithi ka-ang emak, hiwa waipool kabak miring khachu kumsoot ringna aneisik eii.”
Jisu'n hiwa chongngaihi Capernaumma kaom Synagogue ah ileiminchu kha eii.
Ama siamruoi katamtak ngai'n hiwahi inlei rangaiya inleiti, “Hiwahi kangarthei minchuna chong eii; tu juimatorsik me?”
Takkha Jisu'n hiwa jarra asiamruoi ngai'n num intikha aleijet-ah, inmanidiang aleitipi, “Hiwa hi'n nangnidiang kesuina ebejei?
Halle, nangni'n Miring Sapa kha mansa-ah aleiomna munkhan ikal ningmu inle angme ning-ngaidonsik?
Ringna kanape kha Ratha eii, taksa hichu iteii nemna ommak. Kei'n nangnidiang kileiril chong ngaikha ratha khat-um ringna kha eii.
Takkha nangni karra kangamnamak mi lekkhat ningom.” Jisu'n inphutna makheiya tu ngaime kangamna maksik khat-um tu inme ama kajuorsik kha aleijet.
Halli ama'n aleiti, “Hiwa jarra eii kei'n nangni diang kileiti, khachu Apa Pathian in ama kha izootpi elekleiya tuteii-um keidiang heiwa matormu.”
Hiwa makheiya anukkajui katamtak in nuk inmalet-ah amale sisuom khaimujei.
Jisu'n soomleini ngaidiang aleiti, “Nangni-um nuk ningmalet-ah ningsizoot be?”
Simon Peter in amadiang aleimasang, “Pumi, tudiang keini'n sinung ngame? kumsoot ringna chongkha nangdiang om; Matt 16:16; Mk 8:29; Luk 9:20
Halli keini'n nanghi Pathian diang makheiya kajuo Inthiang kha na eii tihi kin-ngamnajei khat-um kinjetjei.”
Jisu'n inmanidiang aleimasang, “Kei'n nangni soomleini kinakadang emak abe? halli ningkarra miring inkhatchu Seitan eii”
Simon Iscariot sapa Judas jarra eii Jisu'n iril, ajarchu soomleini ngai karra Judas in Pumi ajuorsik eii.
